DOC.HEADLINE: BRIEFLY : AIRLINES
DOC.TEXT: Delta to Reduce Staffing on Short Flights : The nation ' s third-largest carrier said it will have fewer flight_attendants on some of its shortest flights starting Sept . 1 . No layoffs are expected from the changes , and all flights will still meet Federal Aviation Administration requirements , said Todd Clay , a spokesman for Delta Air Lines Inc. The airline expects to save $ 17 million a year from the changes , with a goal of cutting annual operating_costs by about $ 2 billion by June , 1997 .
